definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: earth (so Targum Syr.; = BH [[אֶרֶץ]], q.v.);—emph. [[אַרְעָא]] Da 2:35, Da 2:39 + 16 t. Dn, Ezr 5:11, Je 10:11; [[אַ֫רְעָא]] (D:§§ 9, 5 a; 44, 1 n) = [[אֲרַע]] + [[ָ֠]] of direction, earthward, i.e. downward, [[אַרְעָא מִנָּח]] Da 2:39 Kt lower than thou, i.e. inferior to thee Qr [[אֲרַע]] (cf. Targum [[אֲרַע מִן]] Ru 4:4);—Je 10:11 v.[ [[אֲרַק]]].
